Text:
If you're getting low download speeds, blame the many ungrateful idiots who have downloaded this in full and are not helping to seed. 

Once you have downloaded this, please help seed. By all means close your sharing program (uTorrent, BitTorrent, etc.) while you are using your computer, but open it up before you go to bed and help. Don't be selfish. 

Many thanks.
